response.overview: Pressure mounts for Richard, a professional photographer, as he races against time to reach a high-stakes wedding for a demanding client. Already late and facing barrage of frantic calls, Richard's journey takes a surreal and chilling turn when he unexpectedly visit his friend Santi at his home. Claiming to have a car trouble near a local lake, Richard convinces a reluctant Santi to abandon his work and drive him back to vehicle. However, as they arrive at desolate shoreline, the reality of Richard's "visit" begins to unravel. Santi discovers Richard's car, but the man sitting inside isn't waiting for a jump-start. In a haunting twist that blurs the lines between the living and the dead, Santi forced to confront a tragic accident and the mysterious "faith" that guided him to the scene.
response.title: The Visit
